title: Bullet-riddled body found in Panjgur - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
PANJGUR: A bullet-riddled body of a man was found near the Pardaan Dam area of Panjgur district on Saturday.

According to Levies officials, local residents informed the district authorities about the finding of the unattended body in the area. Levies personnel shifted it to the district hospital. The body was later identified as Talha Aslam, a resident of Washbood.

According to the officials, the victim had been shot in the head, which caused his death.

Published in Dawn, February 2nd, 2025
